title: Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve Henley Shirt
description: SLIM FIT: Slim fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.
LIGHTWEIGHT T-SHIRT JERSEY: Soft and comfortable knit fabric for a go-to lightweight t-shirt.
HENLEY T-SHIRT: The perfect alternative to your favorite t shirt. Pair this super soft henley with jeans or chinos for comfortable everyday style.
DETAILS: Ribbed neck trim, raglan sleeve with sturdy overlock stitching, and shirttail hem.
We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure that our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality and longer lasting – at affordable prices for the whole family.
